summary: This is a domestic witness travel request form from the SDNY Victim/Witness Unit, dated November 14, 2021, for a fact witness to appear in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The witness is scheduled for trial preparation on December 9-10, 2021, with arrival on December 8, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the travel request form, United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Witness Arrival for Trial Preparation
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to arrive in SDNY for trial preparation in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Trial/Grand Jury Preparation
events.description: The fact witness is needed for trial or grand jury preparation in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Trial/Grand Jury Preparation
events.description: The fact witness is needed for trial or grand jury preparation in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is a travel request form for a fact witness in the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case (Docket No. 20 Cr. 330).
The witness is scheduled for trial/grand jury preparation on December 9 and 10, 2021, with arrival on December 8, 2021.
The witness is identified as a fact witness, not an expert witness, and is not a victim-witness, federal employee, or facing criminal charges.
The form indicates the witness requires hotel accommodation but no unusual travel expenses.
The document references specific DOJ instructions (1300.01.01) for witness travel procedures.
